title: Navigate forwards to a grid in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to grid
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the grid
instructions: Navigate to the first column header in the grid. Note: you may need to press  certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the first column header.
assertion1: Role 'grid' is conveyed
assertion2: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
assertion3: Number of columns (5) is conveyed
assertion5: Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
assertion6: Coordinates of the column header (column 1, row 1) are conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a grid in reading mode
task: navigate backwards to grid
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the grid
instructions: Navigate to the first column header in the grid.
assertion1: Role 'grid' is conveyed
assertion2: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
assertion3: Number of columns (5) is conveyed
assertion5: Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
assertion6: Coordinates of the column header (column 1, row 1) are conveyed

title: Navigate forwards to a grid
task: navigate forwards to grid
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the grid
instructions: Navigate to the first column header in the grid. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Right) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the first column header.
assertion1: Role 'grid' is conveyed
assertion2: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
assertion3: Number of columns (5) is conveyed
assertion5: Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
assertion6: Coordinates of the column header (column 1, row 1) are conveyed

title: Navigate into the end of a grid in reading mode
task: navigate into end of grid
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the grid
instructions: Navigate to the last cell in the grid. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the last cell.
assertion1: Role 'grid' is conveyed
assertion2: Grid boundary is conveyed
assertion3: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
assertion6: Text of the last column header ('Balance') is conveyed
assertion7: Text of the last cell ('$995,532.00') is conveyed
assertion8: Coordinates of the last cell (column 5, row 7) are conveyed

title: Navigate into the end of a grid
task: navigate into end of grid
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the grid
instructions: Navigate to the last cell in the grid. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the last cell.
assertion1: Role 'grid' is conveyed
assertion2: Grid boundary is conveyed
assertion3: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
assertion6: Text of the last column header ('Balance') is conveyed
assertion7: Text of the last cell ('$995,532.00') is conveyed
assertion8: Coordinates of the last cell (column 5, row 7) are conveyed

title: Move focus forwards into a grid in reading mode
task: move focus forwards into grid
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the grid
instructions: Move keyboard focus onto the first non-header cell in the grid.
assertion1: Role 'grid' is conveyed
assertion2: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
assertion3: Number of columns (5) is conveyed
assertion5: Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
assertion6: Text of the first cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
assertion7: coordinates of the first cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
